name: The story of Perditasol
description:
In the far future, the world of Perditasol has achieved world peace through the use of human modifications, referred to as "mods". After their creation, humans were split into "Naturals", "Halfs" and "Modded" based on how many mods they applied to themselves. 

However the peace did not last, as after 10 years of peace, a great world-wide explosion caused electricity to disappear. This event was dubbed "The incident". Shortly afterwards, disgusting doll-like  creatures called "The molded" began appearing and have thrown the world into complete chaos. 

Take the role of Jade Blackwidow, as you play through a short snippet of his journey through the sci-fi world of Perditasol. In this gameplay slice you will decide the fate of a group of survivors stuck in a morally gray situation, and if you manage to find all the endings, something special awaits you!
